abstract: A timeline of e-mails that Jodie Fisher apparently sent to Mark Hurd, the former chief executive of Hewlett Packard, contrasts the events outlined in a letter that accuses Mr. Hurd of sexual harassment.
snippet: A timeline of e-mails that Jodie Fisher apparently sent to Mark Hurd, the former chief executive of Hewlett Packard, contrasts the events outlined in a letter that accuses Mr. Hurd of sexual harassment.
lead_paragraph: A timeline of e-mails that Jodie Fisher apparently sent to Mark Hurd, the former chief executive of Hewlett Packard, contrasts the events outlined in a letter that accuses Mr. Hurd of sexual harassment.

headline.main: The Allred/Fisher Letter vs. Emails sent by Jodie Fisher
